sentences.english: To work a treadle . Or operate a lathe?

sentences.english: To overcome this solid steel billets were turned in the center lathe.

sentences.english: Such as lathe with adjacent source, you should set the vibration in the ditch near the lathe.
sentences.chinese: 如车床邻近有振源，则在车床附近应设置防振沟。

sentences.english: From the distribution, the maintainability level of CNC lathes has been evaluated.

sentences.english: Variable speed lathe with a fork is the product of one of the main parts.

sentences.english: The turning-lathe that has the sharpest knives produces the finest work.

sentences.english: This paper describes the design method of the swinging master as the attachment in a camshaft copying lathe.

sentences.english: Clutch in headstock makes the lathe more attractive.

sentences.english: Automatic lathes perform basically similar functions but apper in a varitety of forms.
